categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: In 0.5 ABY, a skirmish too place in the Purnham system between a group of pirates acting out from a asteroid group in the Purnham system and the crews of the Millennium Falcon and Melnor Spear who had formed an uneasy alliance of convenience. During the battle one of the pirate ships was destroyed and only two members of the crew of the other pirate vessel survived to be interrogated by the members of the Hand of Judgment.
